Package util.impl

Class FileWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.impl.FileWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class FileWorker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Contains functionality for searching in an own thread. Searches a directory, puts the file information in a queue to shared with UploadWorker and moves uploaded files in a subfolder called "uploaded"

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileWorker

        public FileWorker​(java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> queueNewFiles,
                  java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> queueUploadedFiles,
                  java.lang.Object syncObj,
                  javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty uploadWorkerRunning)
        This is the constructor
        Parameters:
        queueNewFiles - Queue that contains pictures they have to be uploaded. Shared between threads
        queueUploadedFiles - Queue that contains pictures they have already been uploaded. Shared between threads
        syncObj - Object that is used for synchronizing stop of work. Shared between threads
        uploadWorkerRunning - Property for running state of UploadWorker. Shared between threads

        Sets data before thread is starting work and creates subfolder if not exists
        Parameters:
        interval - Seconds between checks for new pictures
        folderPath - Path of the directory of new pictures
